mese nikuth wana pawadim chodana sambandhayen niwaradi parikshanayak sidu nokalahoth adala chodana indiya 2011 loka kusalana jayagrahakayin wethata pawa balapa haki bawa arawinda da silwa wisin wides madhya wetha pawasa thibe. 96 loka kusalana awasan maha tharagayedi jayagrahi shathakaya wartha kale arawinda da silwa wisini. 2011 loka kusalana samaye shri lanka krikat therim kamituwe ewaka sabhapathithwaya daruwe da arawinda da silwa wima wisheshathwayaki. 1996 loka kusalana jayagrahi kandayame nayaka arjuna ranathungada mita ihathadi, enam 2017 wasare di adala 2011 loka kusalana awasan maha tharagaya pawadunna dayi thamatada gataluwak pawathina bawata prakasha kara thibe.
